bibl.title: Sailing with the Mu’allim: The Technical Practice of Red Sea Sailing during the Medieval Period.
Navigated Spaces, Connected Places. Proceedings of Red Sea Project V Held at the University of Exeter, 16-19 September 2010.

bibl.note: Introduction. - A brief history of the lateen / settee sail. - Early lateen / settee sails in the Indian Ocean. - Sailing with the Mu‘allim. - Conclusion.
bibl.seg: Julian Whitewright, Sailing with the Mu’allim: The Technical Practice of Red Sea Sailing during the Medieval Period.

Dionisius A. Agius, John P. Cooper, Athena Trakadas & Chiara Zazzaro (edd.), Navigated Spaces, Connected Places. Proceedings of Red Sea Project V Held at the University of Exeter, 16-19 September 2010 = British Foundation for the Study of Arabia Monographs. 12 = BAR International Series. 2346 (Oxford, 2012) pp. 147-156, 7 figg.
